channel.title: MY remote controll lawl 100% prims ( With buttons now)
channel.description:
Well i got bored so i decided to make a remote too :3 OUT OF 100% PRIMS it dosent have any buttons cuz it would take too long so yeaa. :D
[IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd414/andriy81/remotecontrol.jpg[/img]
With buttons ;D
[IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd414/andriy81/remotecontrol2.jpg[/img]

item.title: MY remote controll lawl 100% prims ( With buttons now)
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:12, topic:380772”][quote author=Timberpig. link=topic=476590.msg3487490#msg3487490 date=1296701619]
seriously? whats up with the damn remotes -.- absolutely no skill is required to one.
[/quote]
I requested one because of a conversation that went on between Troll-scape and i. When he made it he didn’t do a good job, so two of us basicly remade the remote. That all you want to know?[/quote]
The original purpose of his post still stands.

Timberpig.:

absolutely no skill is required to one.

Read full topic

item.title: MY remote controll lawl 100% prims ( With buttons now)
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:5, topic:380772”]“It would take to long”

Models are supposed to take some time. Add the buttons.[/quote]
Lawl’d. And first off connect those primitives together. We don’t want to see primitives rubbing up against each other. Primitives dry humping = bad.

Read full topic
